home_title: Zamura izina ryawe ukoresheje urubuga rwa 15,000 Frw gusa
name: Izina
success_message: ✅ Ubutumwa bwawe bwakiriwe neza. Turagusaba gutegereza igisubizo kuri imeyili cyangwa nimero witanze.
what_is_bonusAfrica: BonusAfrica igufasha kugaragara kuri interineti ku giciro gito, ukoresheje ibisubizo bigezweho kandi byihuse.
Description: BonusAfrica ni sosiyete ya tekinoloji yo muri Afurika igamije kugeza ikoranabuhanga ku bantu bose.Twemera ko ikoranabuhanga rifite uruhare rwiza mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Discover: Menya ibisubizo byihariye tugufitiye kugira ngo ugerweho n’intsinzi mu ikoranabuhanga
creation-site-description: Urubuga rwihuse rw'amamaza ibikorwa byawe ku 15,000 Frw.
ecommerce-site-description: Curuza ibicuruzwa byawe kuri interineti byoroshye.
delivery-app-description: Gucunga ibikorwa byo gutanga mu bigo.
portfolio-description: Erekana ubushobozi bwawe neza ku 15,000 Frw.
web-dev-details: Dukora imbuga zabugenewe dukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rishya...
mobile-app-details: Dukora porogaramu zigendanwa kuri iOS na Android...
graphic-design-benefits: Ibikoresho byo kwamamaza ku mpapuro no kuri internet
team-support-description: Ikipe yacu y’inzobere iragufasha buri ntambwe
team-support-details: Muri BonusAfrica, twemera gufasha umuntu ku giti cye. Ikipe yacu ihari igihe cyose kuva aho mumenyaniye kugeza aho igikorwa kirangiye.
latest_tech_description: Dukoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho kugira ngo dutange ibisubizo binogeye
testimonials_intro: Menya ibyo abakiliya bacu bavuga ku kazi dukora
premium_service_intro: Serivisi yacu ya premium itanga ibisubizo bijyanye n’ibyo ukeneye byihariye...
about_description: Turi kompanyi igizwe n’urubyiruko rw’Afurika rwiyemeje gukemura neza ibibazo by’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho. Icyitonderwa cyacu cya mbere ni uko wishimira serivisi zacu.
faq_how_to_join_answer: Ushobora gukanda kuri buto "Ohereza itegeko ryanjye" cyangwa kudukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
faq_advantage_question: Ni ayahe mahirwe yo gukorana na BonusAfrica?
faq_advantage_answer: Turi kompanyi igizwe n’urubyiruko rw’Afurika rwiyemeje gukemura neza ibibazo by’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho. Icyo dushyize imbere ni uko wanyurwa na serivisi zacu.
faq_project_duration: Gukora umushinga bimara igihe kingana iki?
faq_project_duration_answer: Biterwa n’uburemere bw’umushinga, ariko akenshi turawutanga hagati y’iminsi 3 na 7.
faq_payment_methods: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura bwemewe?
faq_payment_methods_answer: Twemera Mobile Money, konti ya banki, PayPal n’amakarita y’imari.
faq_modification_policy: Ese nshobora gusaba impinduka nyuma yo kwakira umushinga?
faq_modification_policy_answer: Yego, wemerewe impinduka z’ubuntu hakurikijwe ibyo mwumvikanye mbere.
